record.title: MEASURE READ THE FIRST TIME--S. 2556
record.narrative:
MEASURE READ THE FIRST TIME--S. 2556 -- (Senate - January 24, 2008)

[Page: S301]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I understand that S. 2556, introduced earlier today by Senator Reid, the majority leader, is at the desk, and I ask for its first reading.

record.chair: The clerk will read the title of the bill.
record.narrative: The legislative clerk read as follows:
A bill (S. 2556) to extend the provisions of the Protect America Act of 2007 for an additional 30 days.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I now ask for its second reading and object to my own request.

record.chair: The bill will receive its second reading on the next legislative day.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I suggest the absence of a quorum.

record.chair: The clerk will call the roll.
The legislative clerk proceeded to call the roll.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the order for the quorum call be rescinded.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
